  • 方法详细资料

    • copy

      public static long copy(InputStream in, OutputStream out) throws IOException
      the utility api of copying all data in "inputstream" to "outputstream". please refers copy(in, out, boolean)
      参数:
      in - the inputstream
      out - the outputstream
      返回:
      int the size of copied
      抛出:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • delete

      public static int delete(File f) throws IOException
      抛出:
      IOException

    • delete

      public static int delete(File f, long age, Consumer<String> func) throws IOException
      delete the file or the path.
      参数:
      f - the file or the path
      返回:
      the number deleted
      抛出:
      IOException - throw exception when delete the file or directory error

      public static int copyDir(File src, File dest, BiConsumer<String,Integer> func) throws IOException
      copy files.
      参数:
      src - the source file
      dest - the destination file
      返回:
      the number copied
      抛出:
      IOException - throw exception when copy failed

    • copyDir

      public static int copyDir(File src, File dest, String[] except) throws IOException
      copy all the files except.
      参数:
      src - the source dir
      dest - the destination dir
      except - the files
      返回:
      the number files copied
      抛出:
      IOException - throw IOException if error

    • copy

      public static long copy(File src, File dest) throws IOException
      copy file src to file destination.
      参数:
      src - the source file
      dest - the destination file
      返回:
      int of copied
      抛出:
      IOException - throw exception when copy file failed

    • copy

      public static long copy(DFile src, DFile dest) throws IOException
      抛出:
      IOException

    • copy

      public static int copy(InputStream in, OutputStream out, long start, long end, boolean closeAfterDone) throws IOException
      copy the data in "inputstream" to "outputstream", from start to end.
      参数:
      in - the inputstream
      out - the outputstream
      start - the start position of started
      end - the end position of ended
      closeAfterDone - close after done, true: close if done, false: not close
      返回:
      int the size of copied
      抛出:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • copy

      public static long copy(InputStream in, OutputStream out, boolean closeAfterDone) throws IOException
      Copy data in "inputstream" to "outputstream".
      参数:
      in - the inputstream
      out - the outputstream
      closeAfterDone - close after done, true: close if done, false: not close
      返回:
      int the size of copied
      抛出:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
